data.text:
We are thrilled to announce the call for chapters for our upcoming book with Dr Marilena Antoniadou, "Belonging in the Workplace: Perspectives and Practices," to be published by Edward Elgar Publishing in Cary Cooper's New Horizons in Management series. This collaborative effort aims to explore the vital concept of belonging in today's professional environments. Book Details: Title: Belonging in the Workplace: Perspectives and Practices Series: New Horizons in Management, Cary Cooper Publisher: Edward Elgar Publishing Expected Publication Date: 2025 We invite academics, researchers, and practitioners to contribute their insights on the diverse facets of workplace belonging. Your contribution will be part of a thought-provoking collection that transcends industry boundaries and applies to all sectors and professions. Submission Deadlines: Abstract Submission: 1st March 2024 Final Chapter Submission: 2nd January 2025 How to Contribute: Review the instructions for authors (https://lnkd.in/ewHDfnuQ) and submit a short abstract of your proposed chapter by 1st March 2024, at EESubmissions@mmu.ac.uk. Your valuable perspective will shape a comprehensive exploration of belonging in the workplace. ðŸ˜Š

To all Community Management Industry Leaders - Break the Norms! Technology is changing every industry. It is time for the community management industry to look at technology differently. The MGCOne (Patent Pending) online platform and marketplace will change both community living and management experiences. Please see this video https://lnkd.in/g3yK2T-j

Trust is important to your business, right? But does your organisation understand how trust works and more importantly, how to scientifically achieve it? Our Founder, Johann Ponnampalam, PhD recently spoke with #Forbes Editor-in-Chief, Sarah O'Carroll, about the science of trust. Consumer trust in an organisation is built on four proofs: 1. integrity 2. benevolence 3. integrity 4. predictability So how do you think your organisation ranks on these? Do you want to work from the validated science of trust and learn not only how to build consumer trust but also how to keep it? https://lnkd.in/gZqUBSCF #trust #scienceoftrust #behaviouralscience
